name: Cityfurnish
headline: Cityfurnish - Commitment-free furniture rentals for a better you!
description: Cityfurnish is a rental subscription service for furniture and appliances in India. Today, there are 350M people renting unfurnished or semi-furnished apartments in India; Cityfurnish provides an easy, affordable and hassle-free solution. The founding team shares 25+ years of furniture retailing experience and has grown the business to 8,000+ subscribers.

founders.name: Neerav Jain, Founder
founders.description:
Neerav Jain is the founder & CEO of CityFurnish.
Cityfurnish is India's leading furniture & appliances rental subscription brand.

#### What Is Furniture Rental?
Furniture rental is although a relatively new concept in India, yet it has become immensely popular in the past few years. The reasons are many and obvious.
  * First of all, it is of very good quality and highly affordable. 
  * If you are renting furniture, you're not compromising on your flexibility. You can return the furniture whenever you want without having to worry about losing a lot of money in case you are in a hurry to leave. 
  * The third most important point is, it's easy to get. Just a few steps and your choice of furniture is delivered, assembled and installed in a blink of an eye. 
  * It is just perfect for those who are looking for a convenient and cost-effective solution to their furniture needs.


But this is not all. Furniture rental eliminates the hassle associated with buying new pieces, like In case you suddenly move, you don't have to worry about your old furniture being unfit for your new space. Just get new pieces which fit perfectly without getting into the trouble of getting rid of old furniture.
To summarise it all, furniture rental allows you to borrow furniture for as long as you wan, we have tenure options ranging from 3 months till 12 months. #### The Benefits of Furniture Rental
Furniture rental has a ton of benefits for those looking to furnish their home or office space. For starters, it's significantly more affordable than purchasing furniture outright. It's also very accessible, meaning that you don't have to pay upfront to get the furniture you want. Lastly, it's incredibly flexible - meaning you can switch up the pieces or return them whenever it suits you.
Here are a few of the main advantages:
  * Furniture rental is a much more cost-effective way to furnish your home or office than buying it outright. You get access to stylish furniture without having to break the bank.
  * You don't need a large sum of money upfront to rent furniture, simply sign up to our furniture rental package and we will take care of everything for you.
  * With furniture rental, you have the option to switch out pieces whenever you want or even return them after a short time if they're no longer needed. This makes it an ideal choice for people who move regularly.


#### Who Can Rent Furniture? Students, Temporary Workers and More
One of the great things about furniture rental is that it's open to almost anyone. Students, temporary workers, and even regular homeowners can all make use of furniture rental services. Whether you're looking for extra bed for your guests, or new apartment furniture before your big move, you can easily rent what you need without breaking the bank or signing a long-term commitment. Our felexible periods as short as 3 months.
**Students**
Furniture rental is especially useful for students. Moving into a dorm room or off-campus housing often entails buying new furniture, which can be expensive. It makes more financial sense to rent affordable pieces like desks and chairs instead of buying them outright, especially if you're moving out of campus housing in a few months and don't need to be saddled with long-term furniture costs.
**Temporary Workers**
Workers who relocate for short-term positions may find themselves staying in furnished corporate apartments. In this case, the apartment may come with basic furniture like beds and dressers, but not necessarily the decorative pieces that help turn a space into a home. Furniture rental can give workers extra comfort as they transition from city to city as needed by their job.
**Homeowners**
Regular homeowners may decide to rent furniture if they’re renting out their apartment or sprucing up their place for guests during the holidays or other special occasions. Rather than buy a whole set of dining chairs or couches and leave them in storage afterwards, renting furniture allows people to get only what they need without committing long-term expenses.
#### Is It Easy to Rent Furniture? Convenient and Flexible Options
Yes, renting furniture is easy, it’s so easy, you can do it all online with just a few clicks. You don't need to worry about complicated contracts or spending hundreds of dollars at once.
**Easy Process**
The whole process is really simple: you select the pieces you like and decide how long you want to rent them. There's no need to fill out endless forms. Everything is done entirely online and the best part of all is that the whole process takes place right from your laptop or phone, no in-person visits necessary.
**Flexible Rental Options**
Furniture rental offers you flexibility when it comes to payment and duration. You can rent furniture for as little as three months or as long as you want, even up to one year if needed. You can also choose from different payment plans such as monthly or even all upfront payment options depending on your preference. Plus, you have the freedom to switch out furniture whenever you want.
No matter what your needs are, renting furniture is an easy and affordable way to get quality pieces without breaking the bank. With flexible payment plans and convenient online ordering options, there's never been an easier way to make your home look great.

## Frequently Asked Questions
### How can I rent from Cityfurnish?
Renting from Cityfurnish only takes three steps :
  * - Choose the products that vibe best with your house and pick a tenure period of 3, 6, 9, or 12 months.
  * - Submit the necessary documents to complete the KYC process (don't worry, it's completely safe).
  * - Get the delivery and assembly done on the promised date.


To know more please visit [our faq page](https://cityfurnish.com/<https:/cityfurnish.com/pages/how-it-works>)
### What is the minimum tenure to avail furniture rental from Cityfurnish?
To rent any furniture from us, you have to follow a minimum tenure of 3 months. If you choose to discontinue your subscription before 3 months, you'll have to pay for the entire 3-month period.
### What is the minimum monthly rental to avail the services?
The minimum monthly rental for our services is INR 299.
### Can I get the actual product picture?
All the photos on our website are real pictures of the product. We do a photoshoot with all our items to give you a taste of what every item will look like in your home.
### What happens after my tenure is over?
You have two options when your subscription tenure is over:
  * - Option 1: Renew your subscription for 3, 6, 9, or 12 months at discounted rental (we'd love that)
  * - Option 2: Inform the team about ending your subscription and raise a request


### Are there any charges for subscription cancellation?
No, there are no charges for cancelling a subscription before delivery. However, if you cancel a subscription 48 hours after delivery, you will have to pay early termination charges.
### Can I reject/return the complete/partial products at the time of delivery?
Yes, you can reject or return either all the products or some of them at the time of delivery. You'll get a full refund for all the returned products.

#### What Is Furniture Rental?
Furniture rental is although a relatively new concept in India, yet it has become immensely popular in the past few years. The reasons are many and obvious.
  * First of all, it is of very good quality and highly affordable. 
  * If you are renting furniture, you're not compromising on your flexibility. You can return the furniture whenever you want without having to worry about losing a lot of money in case you are in a hurry to leave. 
  * The third most important point is, it's easy to get. Just a few steps and your choice of furniture is delivered, assembled and installed in a blink of an eye. 
  * It is just perfect for those who are looking for a convenient and cost-effective solution to their furniture needs.


But this is not all. Furniture rental eliminates the hassle associated with buying new pieces, like In case you suddenly move, you don't have to worry about your old furniture being unfit for your new space. Just get new pieces which fit perfectly without getting into the trouble of getting rid of old furniture.
To summarise it all, furniture rental allows you to borrow furniture for as long as you wan, we have tenure options ranging from 3 months till 12 months. And when you get high-quality furniture pieces of your choice from trusted brands at a fraction of the price, without having to worry about maintenance or storage, there is no reason to compromise on comfort anymore. The process is simple; paperwork is online and minimal, delivery is quick and coordinated to make you enjoy your furniture as soon as you place the order. 
#### The Benefits of Furniture Rental
Furniture rental has a ton of benefits for those looking to furnish their home or office space. For starters, it's significantly more affordable than purchasing furniture outright. It's also very accessible, meaning that you don't have to pay upfront to get the furniture you want. Lastly, it's incredibly flexible - meaning you can switch up the pieces or return them whenever it suits you.
Here are a few of the main advantages:
  * Furniture rental is a much more cost-effective way to furnish your home or office than buying it outright. You get access to stylish furniture without having to break the bank.
  * You don't need a large sum of money upfront to rent furniture, simply sign up to our furniture rental package and we will take care of everything for you.
  * With furniture rental, you have the option to switch out pieces whenever you want or even return them after a short time if they're no longer needed. This makes it an ideal choice for people who move regularly.


#### Who Can Rent Furniture? Students, Temporary Workers and More
One of the great things about furniture rental is that it's open to almost anyone. Students, temporary workers, and even regular homeowners can all make use of furniture rental services. Whether you're looking for extra bed for your guests, or new apartment furniture before your big move, you can easily rent what you need without breaking the bank or signing a long-term commitment. Our felexible periods as short as 3 months.
**Students**
Furniture rental is especially useful for students. Moving into a dorm room or off-campus housing often entails buying new furniture, which can be expensive. It makes more financial sense to rent affordable pieces like desks and chairs instead of buying them outright, especially if you're moving out of campus housing in a few months and don't need to be saddled with long-term furniture costs.
**Temporary Workers**
Workers who relocate for short-term positions may find themselves staying in furnished corporate apartments. In this case, the apartment may come with basic furniture like beds and dressers, but not necessarily the decorative pieces that help turn a space into a home. Furniture rental can give workers extra comfort as they transition from city to city as needed by their job.
**Homeowners**
Regular homeowners may decide to rent furniture if they’re renting out their apartment or sprucing up their place for guests during the holidays or other special occasions. Rather than buy a whole set of dining chairs or couches and leave them in storage afterwards, renting furniture allows people to get only what they need without committing long-term expenses.
#### Is It Easy to Rent Furniture? Convenient and Flexible Options
Yes, renting furniture is easy, it’s so easy, you can do it all online with just a few clicks. You don't need to worry about complicated contracts or spending hundreds of dollars at once.
**Easy Process**
The whole process is really simple: you select the pieces you like and decide how long you want to rent them. There's no need to fill out endless forms. Everything is done entirely online and the best part of all is that the whole process takes place right from your laptop or phone, no in-person visits necessary.
**Flexible Rental Options**
Furniture rental offers you flexibility when it comes to payment and duration. You can rent furniture for as little as three months or as long as you want, even up to one year if needed. You can also choose from different payment plans such as monthly or even all upfront payment options depending on your preference. Plus, you have the freedom to switch out furniture whenever you want.
No matter what your needs are, renting furniture is an easy and affordable way to get quality pieces without breaking the bank. With flexible payment plans and convenient online ordering options, there's never been an easier way to make your home look great.
#### How Does Furniture Rental Work? The Renting Process Explained
Still confused about how renting furniture works? It's really easy, and here's what you need to know:
  1. **Choose Your Furniture** - You can choose from a variety of furniture, including sofas, chairs, beds, tables and more. You can base your decision on size, price range and style.
  2. **Make the Payment** - Make the payment using a secure payment method such as a credit card or bank transfer.
  3. **Delivery** - Choose a convenient time and get your furniture delivered.
  4. **Installation and Set Up** - We provide installation and set-up services for free, so you don't have to worry about doing it yourself.
  5. **Enjoy Your Furniture** - Now that you have your furniture all setup, enjoy it.


Whether you need furniture for short-term seasons or for moving houses in between leases, furniture rental is an affordable solution that offers great quality and flexibility with no hassle of traditional ownership.

We offer a wide range of furniture options, including sofas, beds, tables, chairs, and others. We do offer home appliances and office furniture.
**Q5. Is furniture rental available in most cities and towns?**
We provide furniture rental services in all main cities of India including Mumbai, Bangalore, Pune, Delhi, Gurgugram, Noida and Hyderabad.
On Cityfurnish.com everything from bedroom furniture to office furniture can be rented, so you can create the home and workspace of your dreams, quickly and cost-effectively. Get the furniture you want, when you want it with our easy and hassle free furniture rental solutions.

## Frequently Asked Questions
### How can I rent from Cityfurnish?
Renting from Cityfurnish only takes three steps :
  * - Choose the products that vibe best with your house and pick a tenure period of 3, 6, 9, or 12 months.
  * - Submit the necessary documents to complete the KYC process (don't worry, it's completely safe).
  * - Get the delivery and assembly done on the promised date.


To know more please visit our faq page⟨117⟩
### What is the minimum tenure to avail furniture rental from Cityfurnish?
To rent any furniture from us, you have to follow a minimum tenure of 3 months. If you choose to discontinue your subscription before 3 months, you'll have to pay for the entire 3-month period.
### What is the minimum monthly rental to avail the services?
The minimum monthly rental for our services is INR 299.
### Can I get the actual product picture?
All the photos on our website are real pictures of the product. We do a photoshoot with all our items to give you a taste of what every item will look like in your home.
### What happens after my tenure is over?
You have two options when your subscription tenure is over:
  * - Option 1: Renew your subscription for 3, 6, 9, or 12 months at discounted rental (we'd love that)
  * - Option 2: Inform the team about ending your subscription and raise a request


### Are there any charges for subscription cancellation?
No, there are no charges for cancelling a subscription before delivery. However, if you cancel a subscription 48 hours after delivery, you will have to pay early termination charges.
### Can I reject/return the complete/partial products at the time of delivery?
Yes, you can reject or return either all the products or some of them at the time of delivery. You'll get a full refund for all the returned products.

generated_description:
Cityfurnish is revolutionizing the way people think about furniture and appliance ownership in India. Founded in 2015 in New Delhi, this innovative company takes an approach that combines convenience with affordability. In a country where 350 million people reside in rental homes, Cityfurnish provides a hassle-free option for those looking to furnish their spaces without the heavy investment typically associated with purchasing furniture.

**What They Do**: Cityfurnish offers commitment-free furniture and appliance rentals tailored to fit various lifestyles. They cater to students, professionals, and families, allowing them to rent high-quality furniture for durations as short as three months and as long as a year. This flexibility is particularly appealing to young professionals and migrants who often change residences.

**Key Features**:
- **Affordability**: Renting from Cityfurnish is significantly cheaper than buying, allowing customers to enjoy stylish living without hefty expenses.
- **Convenience**: The entire rental process can be managed online—choose your items, sign up, and receive your furniture at home within 72 hours. Delivery and installation are included.
- **Quality Assured**: With a range of over 300 designs, all items are vetted for quality, making it easy to have a tastefully decorated space.

As a graduate of Y Combinator’s Batch W19, the founding team brings 25+ years of experience in the furniture retailing industry. With a robust team of about 90 employees, Cityfurnish has already gained over 200,000 satisfied subscribers and consistently maintains a high customer rating of 4.6 stars.

**Promotions & Offers**: Cityfurnish frequently runs promotions, such as 30% off your first order with the code RENT30, enticing new users to experience their services.

The company not only focuses on home users but also extends its offerings to businesses looking for bulk rental solutions—making Cityfurnish a one-stop shop for all your furnishing needs. 

### Summary
Cityfurnish is reshaping the rental market in India by offering an affordable, flexible, and easy way to furnish homes and offices without the burdens associated with ownership. Whether you’re a student, a professional, or a family in transition, they’ve got the right furniture solution for you. For more information, check out their website at [Cityfurnish.com](https://cityfurnish.com/).
